name: The Amazing Web-Harveting (MiniJam 123 edition)
description:
Real-time puzzle/action game.

You control 4 villains that invaded Spidey HQ to steal back their own magical treasures.

# How to play

(it's a digital implementation of Magic Maze board game. You can check it for tutorials and extra explanations)

You control all 4 villains simultaneously.

Any villain can execute each action in the left panel. There are 4 types of actions:

  • MOVE (north, south, east, west): select a villain, then the tile to move.
  • TELEPORT: each villain can be teleported to its colored teleporter.
  • EXPLORE: at the corners of the map, there are some collared arrows. The villain SHOULD BE ON the tile to use the action. It will open extra tiles.
  • LADDER: some times have a special ladder that links to another tile. The villain SHOULD BE ON the tile. It will move the villain to the other tile.

You must find all 4 SPECIAL ITEMs and move each villain on them AT THE SAME. They will steal and trigger the alarm Now you have to EXIT.

If a villain goes over the Timer tile, it will add 3 minutes to your time. It will activate it once.

Extra Notes

Icons were created using AI: https://www.craiyon.com/

No audio or music.

3D from a free library I acquired ages ago and some done by myself.
